data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Bohol prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bohol, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: the state of Bohol has (about) 106,410 people who know Jesus, 588,474 people who know about him culturally, and 69,016 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Bohol, Philippines to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bohol, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Molbog people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Molbog people.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Bohol.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Bohol, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 657,490 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Bohol, Philippines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
